question: Is it allowed to have any kind of relationship - like friendship/family contact / business partnerships- with Qaidiyanis?
answer:
QUESTION

Is it allowed to have any kind of relationship - like friendship/family contact / business partnerships- with Qaidiyanis?




ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

It is not permissible to sit, eat & drink or even keep any type of relationship (i.e. friendship, family or business partnership) with the Qadiyanis.Â  One may associate with Qadiyanis only with the intention of correcting their beliefs. [Fatawa Mahmoodiyyah V2/ pg130].

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai (M1)
Darul Iftaa
